channel.title: GoLang on The Unhandled Exception Podcast
channel.description: Recent content in GoLang on The Unhandled Exception Podcast

item.title: Episode 45: Go - with Joseph Woodward
item.description: In this episode, I was joined by Joseph Woodward to chat all about the Go programming language. Joe has done a lot of dotnet in the past, but is now focusing more on Go - so an ideal guest to help us compare on contrast. Joseph is a Software Engineer at Form3, speaker, and open-source contributor. Lover of Go, OSS, Neovim and distributed systems things. Joe’s social links Twitter GitHub LinkedIn Blog Links from the show Go website Learn Go Video by Rob Pike K9s Infographic showing code complexity vs developer experience Devpick links Book: The Fearless Organisation, by Amy Edmondson Listener mention Shawn Stoddard
